title: Washington Post calls for stricter SNAP qualifications, widespread fraud crackdown after Minnesota scandal
description: The Washington Post editorial board called on the Trump administration to reform SNAP after journalist Nick Shirley exposed over $100 million in alleged Minnesota daycare fraud.
